bibl.title: Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 159.)
bibl.note: 20 contributions: I. Foreign Policy and Diplomatic Relations; - II. Wars and Armies; - III. Exporting and Importing Religion and Culture; - IV. Trade Relations and Linguistic Interactions. - Pp. ix-xxii: P.K. and K.M., Introduction; - 361-369: Index.
bibl.seg: KOUSOULIS Panagiotis and Konstantinos MAGLIVERAS (Edd.), Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 159.)
Leuven - Paris - Dudley, Mass., Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 2007, 8°, vii-369 pp., 41 figg. ISBN 978-90-429-1871-9. €74.
